head: Quiz-Wiz
data: The annual qizzing event organised by the Computer Science & Engineering Department will be held in near future.

head: Code Marathon
data: The annual month-long competitive programming competition Code Marathon will be conducted by the Department of Computer Science & Engineering in near future.

head: RAIT
data: The International Conference on Recent Advances in Information Technology ( RAIT ) is being organised by Computer Science & Engineering Department since 2007.
